Deezer Song Search Version 1.0 Yashika
Instructions "In the Dezzer song search, you can enter the name of the artist and click on search to get a list of songs. Further clicking on the songs you can see details for that song. Also you can add the song to the Favourites to see them later." Yashika How much money do you want to donate?"string>
